div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 133px; height: 1px; padding-top: 20px; margin-left: 119px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 95px; margin-left: 22px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
- Stores secrets
- Generates temporary access keys
- Constructs backup shell commands basing on what user want to do e.g. "Backup files" means running tar with proper flags
- Spawns "Backup Maker" in a shell, container or Kubernetes pod

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 133px; height: 1px; padding-top: 28px; margin-left: 639px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 338px; height: 1px; padding-top: 108px; margin-left: 537px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 13px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
- Uses prepared command by "Backup Controller" to perform backup/restore
- Encrypts using GPG with keys provided from "Backup Controller"
- Sends files to "Backup Repository" server or receives from server if restoring

switch.text: - Uses prepared command by "Backup Controller" to pe...

div.div:
- Stores backups "as is"
- Rotates backups
- Takes care about permissions
- Quota allocation
- Multi tenancy
